Durham Restaurants, North Carolina What type of restaurant experience do you want in Durham. An Italian restaurant, Chinese restaurant, Continental European restaurant, African restaurant, BBQ, French restaurant, Mexican restaurant, Sea Food restaurant or some Pizza and fast food. Durham has a range of great restaurants to suit any occasion and palate. Book a Durham restaurant today.
Anotherthyme Restaurant&Bar 109 North Gregson Street, Durham, NC 27701 (919) 682-5225 website
For 30 years, the communities of Durham and Chapel Hill have been enriched and enlivened by the culinary talent and sense of style&integrity that Mary Bacon has applied to her restaurant. With a philosophy of food that is based on rethinking seafood and vegetarian dishes as not being secondary to the meat and potatoes thing, Mary has spent years developing foods that are full of flavor and visual appeal without being dependant on a kitchen
Get a $25 Dining Certificate for Another Thyme Restaurant and Bar, YOUR PRICE: $10.00
Bel Gusto Restaurant 2800 Campus Walk Avenue Durham, NC 27705 (919) 383-8575
When you're in the mood for good times and great cuisine, be sure to check out Bel Gusto Restaurant. The restaurant is located in one of Durham's most pleasant settings and is known for its delightful staff and superb cuisine. The menu at Bel Gusto Restaurant features a wide array of great selections, made from only the freshest and highest quality ingredients, with something sure to please every member of your group.

Bocci Trattoria&Pizzeria 5850 Fayetteville Rd Ste,106 Durham, NC 27713 (919) 206-4067 website
"Thank you for visiting Bocci Trattoria&Pizzeria! Bocci, the game, is an Italian classic; rich in tradition, and reminiscent of good times with family, friends, food and fun! Our goal is to reflect this "Old World" experience! So in the tradition of Italy's trattorias, the sight, sounds and aromas of authentic Italian cuisine are created everyday at Bocci. We offer an array of tempting Italian favorites that include seafood, meat, pasta"

Four Square Restaurant 2701 Chapel Hill Road, Durham, NC 27707 (919) 401-9877 website
The restaurant is located in the restored Victorian-era Bartlett Mangum House, which was built in 1908 and is currently listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
We have seven intimate dining rooms, as well as a cozy six-stool bar. The house features original leaded and stained glass windows, eight unique fireplaces with their original wood, tiled and mirrored mantelpieces, a wraparound porch, the original walnut staircase

Celebrate the ambiance of passion like you've never seen before...unless perhaps you jet to New York or London's hot and trendy night spots. In the Gloft, you will find an eclectic club setting for relaxing and mingling. Our staff will provide you with discreet attention to detail. You will find our drink and wine selections feature the very best brands. Our food, a superior sampling of tasteful adventures.

Parizade 737 9th, Durham, NC 27705 (919) 286-9712 website
"Soft lighting, white tablecloths, and an enclosed courtyard are among the inviting aspects of this Erwin Square bistro. One particularly fine appetizer is fried calamari with jalapeño-tomato salsa; popular entrées include fettuccine with fresh salmon and black-pepper dill cream, sesame pasta with scallops, and roast duck with fresh vegetables. No lunch weekends. " (from fodors.com )

Magellan Press "Where the Locals Eat", Metro Magazine, New York Daily News, and the Herald Sun all agree that you can impress that special someone at Spartacus or bring the whole family. Over the past 10 years, Spartacus catering has become a triangle favorite."

Join us at the new Symposium Caf at the American Tobacco Historic District located in Durham, North Carolina.
We offer an upscale but casual ambience, together with food and drink of superb quality at modest prices. Our menu consists of gourmet sandwiches and wraps, classic entre selections, exotic desserts, fresh fruit drinks, and specialty coffees and teas.

Taverna Nikos Brightleaf Square 905 W Main St #49, Durham, NC 27701 (919) 682-0043 website
Nikos gets much of its charm its location in historical Brightleaf Square, a renovated tobacco warehouse. Brick walls, high ceilings, wooden architecture, grapevines and large Greek replicas create an airy and rustic atmosphere. Discreet Greek music in the background and wonderful aromas coming from the kitchen allow everyone to experience a little bit of Greece in downtown Durham. The courteous owners, friendly staff and wonderful Greek

Vin Rouge has established itself as one of the Triangle's favorite culinary destinations and is sure to offer you a pleasant and unique dining experience every time you visit.

Bel Gusto D' Italia 2800 Campus Walk Avenue, Durham, NC 27705 (919) 382-5024
Bel Gusto Ditalia is an upscale restaurant that offers Italian meals. Expect the average entree to cost between $12 and $20, and you'll be fine if dressed casual. Eating&Drinking: Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Details to Note: Reservations are not necessary. Delivery and carryout are available. Parking has been arranged for customers. Ways to Pay: Cash, MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Diners Club, Discover and Carte Blanche (from dinesite.com )
